entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
